verbose_text: Our study highlights at least five important points : 1) PD significantly inhibits prostate cancer cell growth; 2) PD induces prostate cancer cell apoptosis; 3) PD obstructs cell cycle progression; 4) PD upregulates FOXO3a expression and downregulates MDM2 expression at the transcriptional level and 5) PD dose-dependently decreases the growth of human prostate cancer xenograft tumors in mice.
evidence: FOXO3a expression and downregulates MDM2 expression at the transcriptional level and 5) PD
